title: Ironstylus can we talk about taric?

replies.body: Riot Dudebro mentioned that Taric is on the list but that they want to be careful because he does have such a large following.  So it sounds like he won't have a VU until later.
I think it would be easy to keep his aesthetic will updating him so that he isn't a mess of blurry polygons. Hello triangle cone feet.
You would think its easy, but the community will always find a reason not to like something.

Garen got a more buff, macho look than usual, but almost looks the same.

WE ALL HATE HIM THIS ISN'T GAREN WWWWAAAAAAAH.

I think it might be because of the armor and stuff looking so huge.
They need to change Taric's dance too.
